text: The Eparchy of Akhaltsikhe and Tao-Klarjeti () is an eparchy (diocese) of the Georgian Orthodox Church with its seat in Akhaltsikhe, Georgia. It has jurisdiction over Akhaltsikhe, Adigeni, Aspindza municipalities in Georgia and historical region of Tao-Klarjeti,ცნობარები, ლექსიკონები - საქართველოს ეკლესიის ეპარქიები და მღვდელმთავრები currently part of Turkey. ==Heads== {| align="center" class="wikitable" |- !style=background:#FFDEAD;| Picture !style=background:#FFDEAD;| Name !style=background:#FFDEAD;| Time |- | colspan=4 | Georgian Orthodox Eparchy of Akhaltsikhe and Tao-Klarjeti |- |50px |Ananias |June 29, 1981 — December 25, 1992 |- |50px |Sergi Chekurishvili |December 27, 1992 — October 1997 |- | |Nikoloz Pachuashvili |October 1997 — October 8, 1998 |- |50px |Theodore Chuadze |since November 1998 |} ==See also== *Georgian Orthodox Church in Turkey ==References== ==External links== * ახალციხისა და ტაო-კლარჯეთის ეპარქია * ახალციხისა და ტაო-კლარჯეთის ეპარქია Category:Religious sees of the Georgian Orthodox Church Category:Georgian Orthodox Church in Turkey Category:Dioceses established in the 20th century
title: Eparchy of Akhaltsikhe and Tao-Klarjeti
